fieldName: Cycle 1 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 1 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
description: Cycle 1 Number of Health Deficiencies. This includes the most recent standard survey as well as complaint and infection control surveys from the most recent 12 months.

fieldName: Cycle 1 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 1 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
description: Cycle 1 Number of Fire Safety and Emergency Preparedness Deficiencies

fieldName: Cycle 2 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 2 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
description: Cycle 2 Number of Health Deficiencies. This includes the second most recent standard survey as well as complaint and infection control surveys from 13-24 months ago.

fieldName: Cycle 2 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 2 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
description: Cycle 2 Number of Fire Safety and Emergency Preparedness Deficiencies

fieldName: Cycle 3 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 3 Total Number of Health Deficiencies
description: Cycle 3 Number of Health Deficiencies. This includes the third most recent standard survey as well as complaint and infection control surveys from 25-36 months ago. Note that cycle 3 standard surveys are not used for the health inspection rating.

fieldName: Cycle 3 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
cmsColumnHeader: Cycle 3 Total Number of Fire Safety Deficiencies
description: Cycle 3 Number of Fire Safety and Emergency Preparedness Deficiencies
